name: Imgur Streamlined
description: A simplified and uncluttered skin for the front page and galleries.
additional_info:
** This release has only been tested in Chrome for Windows.

Features:
Compact navigation bar for the font page.
Captions take up less space on image thumbnails, allowing for a better browsing experience on the front page.
Cleaner gallery comments sections.
The "Most viral images" side-bar (right-hand side in galleries) auto-collapses. Mouse over to expand it.
Gallery pages have a slightly more responsive design for smaller desktop screens or window sizes.
